Package de.eldoria.eldoutilities.messages

Class MessageSender

java.lang.Object
de.eldoria.eldoutilities.messages.MessageSender
public final class MessageSender extends Object
A message sender to manage message sending.

Allows definition of a plugin prefix, Message color, Error color.

Allows sending of messages, error messages, titles.

Allows sending of automatically localized messages in combination with a created localizer.

Since:
1.0.0

    • sendLocalizedMessage

      public void sendLocalizedMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String message, Replacement... replacements)
      Send a message to a sender

      The message will be localized.

      The message can be a simple locale code in the format "code" or "code.code....".

      If multiple code should be used every code musst be surrounded by a $ mark. Example "$code.code$ and $code.more.code$. You can write what you want between locale codes.

      Parameters:
      sender - receiver of the message
      message - message with optinal color codes
      replacements - replacements to apply on the message

    • sendLocalizedError

      public void sendLocalizedError(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String message, Replacement... replacements)
      Sends a error to a sender

      The message will be localized.

      The message can be a simple locale code in the format "code" or "code.code....".

      If multiple code should be used every code musst be surrounded by a $ mark. Example "$code.code$ and $code.more.code$. You can write what you want between locale codes.

      Parameters:
      sender - receiver of the message
      message - message with optinal color codes
      replacements - replacements to apply on the message

    • sendLocalized

      public <T extends ChannelData> void sendLocalized(MessageChannel<T> channel, MessageType type, org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String message, Replacement... replacements)
      Send a localized message via a channel.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of channel data
      Parameters:
      channel - channel which should be used
      type - type of message
      sender - target of message
      message - message locale codes
      replacements - replacements for messages in locale codes
      Since:
      1.2.1

    • sendLocalized

      public <T extends ChannelData> void sendLocalized(MessageChannel<T> channel, MessageType type, org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String message, @Nullable T data, Replacement... replacements)
      Send a localized message via a channel.
      Type Parameters:
      T - channel data type
      Parameters:
      channel - channel which should be used
      type - type of message
      sender - target of message
      message - message locale codes
      replacements - replacements for messages in locale codes
      data - additional data for channel
      Since:
      1.3.0
